scenarios.name: <option> % Minimum Recycling Rate
scenarios.description: Policy which requires that a certain percent of plastic waste is recycled by 2050. Try out levels beyond those listed in the dropdown by going to the details tab. Assumes that there is a gradual phase in and compliance.

scenarios.name: <option> % Minimum Recycled Content
scenarios.description: Policy which requires a certain percent of products are made with recycled materials by 2050. Try out levels beyond those listed in the dropdown by going to the details tab. Assumes that there is a gradual phase in and compliance.

scenarios.name: Cap to 2030 Virgin Production
scenarios.description: Require that annual virgin plastic production is capped to 2030 levels by 2050. The caps are set to match roughly 2030 levels according to the business as usual scenario. Assumes that there is a gradual phase in and compliance.

scenarios.name: Ban Polystyrene Packaging
scenarios.description: Policy which globally bans polystyrene in packaging by 2050. Assumes a shorter term implementation and compliance.

scenarios.name: <option> Billion USD for Plastic Recycling
scenarios.description: Policy which expands plastic recycling infrastructure globally through investment. Try out levels beyond those listed in the dropdown by going to the details tab. Assumes gradual deployment of capital and realization of benefits.

scenarios.name: <option> Billion USD for Waste Management
scenarios.description: Policy which expands waste management (incineration and landfill) infrastructure globally through investment. It is weighted towards regions where more of the mismanaged waste is projected. Try out levels beyond those listed in the dropdown, configure the split between landfill / incineration, or specify individual region-level investments by going to the details tab. Assumes gradual deployment of capital and realization of benefits.

scenarios.name: <option> Packaging Consumption Tax
scenarios.description: Apply a consumption tax on plastic packaging per article. This applies region-specific taxation levels and, to configure specific region-level taxes, go to the details tab. Assumes a shorter term implementation and compliance.

scenarios.name: Existing Policies Fullfilled
scenarios.description: Major known policies with specific targets which have been ratified and started implementation but not yet complete. This includes, for example, the EU Landfill Directive. Checking this indicates that one is assuming those targets are met and the policies are fulfilled.
